name: UPPERDECK AIR
about: UpperDeck Air is a licensed Aviation Support Service Company, duly registered with the Federal Government of Nigeria and the Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority. Based in Lagos, Nigeria, we are an NCAA-approved Aviation Training Organisation (ATO) dedicated to providing comprehensive aviation training, flight operational management, and oversight. Our commitment is to deliver high-quality education and training to aspiring aviators, ensuring they meet the highest industry standards. We strive to foster a safe, professional, and supportive learning environment, preparing our students for successful careers in aviation. At UpperDeck Air, we are passionate about shaping the future of aviation in Nigeria and beyond.
services:
["Cabin Crew Ab-Initio Training
Cabin Crew Refresher/Conversion
Crew Resource Management (CRM)
Safety & Emergency Procedures 
Airline Customer Service"]
